casebody.data:
Donald J. TRUMP, President of the United States, et al., Petitioners,
v.
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF COLORED PEOPLE, et al. No. 18-588 Supreme Court of the United States. November 1, 2019

A total of 80 minutes is allotted for oral argument, and the time is divided as follows: 40 minutes for the Solicitor General, 20 minutes for private respondents, and 20 minutes for state respondent.
